title: League is Not Responding
body: Whenever i try to launch league it says "PVP.net Patcher Kernal has stopped working" and I dont know what to do. Thank You!

replies.body:
As *Sadik* mentioned, configuring League to run with the right administrative privileges will often resolve this issue, as League requires specific rights to access files it relies on that reside outside of the League folder. Follow our [permissions guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) and this issue should be resolved.

Let me know if this resolved your issue.
